name: Boostagon
description:
This is my first game made with Unity and his develpment purpose was to understand and learn the very basics of the Unity as, so several bugs maybe found on this game, feel free to report any of then.

I hope you enjoy this very basic game.

How to play:

GOAL - You as a rocket pilot need to reach the green platform to pass to other level without crash into the red obstacles.

There is a total of 10 levels , when you pass the last one , the first level will be loaded.

CONTROLS:

SPACE - Turn ON the rocket thrust.

A & D - Rotate the rocket to the left and Right
